trans-unit.source: <properties pageTitle="Troubleshooting dynamic membership for groups| Microsoft Azure" description="A topic that lists troubleshooting tips for dynamic membership for groups in Azure AD." services="active-directory" documentationCenter="" authors="femila" manager="swadhwa" editor="Curtis" tags="azure-classic-portal"/>
trans-unit.target: <properties pageTitle="Troubleshooting dynamic membership for groups| Microsoft Azure" description="A topic that lists troubleshooting tips for dynamic membership for groups in Azure AD." services="active-directory" documentationCenter="" authors="femila" manager="swadhwa" editor="Curtis" tags="azure-classic-portal"/>

trans-unit.source: <tags ms.service="active-directory" ms.workload="identity" ms.tgt_pltfrm="na" ms.devlang="na" ms.topic="article" ms.date="07/13/2015" ms.author="femila"/>
trans-unit.target: <tags ms.service="active-directory" ms.workload="identity" ms.tgt_pltfrm="na" ms.devlang="na" ms.topic="article" ms.date="07/13/2015" ms.author="femila"/>

trans-unit.source: Symptom
trans-unit.target: Symptom

trans-unit.source: Action
trans-unit.target: Action

trans-unit.source: I configured a rule on a group but no memberships get updated in the group
trans-unit.target: I configured a rule on a group but no memberships get updated in the group

trans-unit.source: Verify the Enable delegated group management setting is set to Yes in the Directory Configure tab.
trans-unit.target: Verify the Enable delegated group management setting is set to Yes in the Directory Configure tab.

trans-unit.source: Note that you will only see this setting if you are signed in with an account that has an Azure Active Directory Premium license assigned to it.
trans-unit.target: Note that you will only see this setting if you are signed in with an account that has an Azure Active Directory Premium license assigned to it.

trans-unit.source: Verify the values for user attributes on the rule – are there users that satisfy the rule?
trans-unit.target: Verify the values for user attributes on the rule – are there users that satisfy the rule?

trans-unit.source: I configured a rule, but now the existing members of the rule are removed
trans-unit.target: I configured a rule, but now the existing members of the rule are removed

trans-unit.source: This is expected – existing members of the group are removed when a rule is enabled or changed.
trans-unit.target: This is expected – existing members of the group are removed when a rule is enabled or changed.

trans-unit.source: The resulting set of users from evaluation of the rule is added as members to the group.
trans-unit.target: The resulting set of users from evaluation of the rule is added as members to the group.

trans-unit.source: I don’t see membership changes instantly when I add or change a rule, why not?
trans-unit.target: I don’t see membership changes instantly when I add or change a rule, why not?

trans-unit.source: Dedicated membership evaluation is done periodically in an asynchronous background process.
trans-unit.target: Dedicated membership evaluation is done periodically in an asynchronous background process.

trans-unit.source: The number of users in your tenant, and the size of the group created as a result of the rule play a factor in how long it takes.
trans-unit.target: The number of users in your tenant, and the size of the group created as a result of the rule play a factor in how long it takes.

trans-unit.source: Typically tenants with small numbers of users will see the group membership changes in less than a few minutes.
trans-unit.target: Typically tenants with small numbers of users will see the group membership changes in less than a few minutes.

trans-unit.source: Tenants with a large number of users can take 30 minutes or longer to populate.
trans-unit.target: Tenants with a large number of users can take 30 minutes or longer to populate.

trans-unit.source: Here are some topics that will provide some additional information on Azure Active Directory
trans-unit.target: Here are some topics that will provide some additional information on Azure Active Directory
